column5: Built in 1932, Casa Tejas, is a 800 sq ft upstairs apartment (four plex) with an old style historic feel, original hardwood floors, with the modern upgrades. It has a full sized bed, living room w/ a Futon, kitchen w/ sink, microwave, gas stove, coffee maker, all dishware and essentials, a separate eating area, full bath....consider it your home away from home.
column8: Casa Tejas at Woodlawn Lake unit #4
